summary: This document appears to be a transcript or summary of an interview or deposition with a female victim (referred to as "her" or "she") regarding her experiences with Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. It details her travel on Epstein's private jet to various locations, the progression and nature of sexual abuse, Maxwell's involvement in facilitating abuse and travel, and interactions with other individuals. The victim describes abuse occurring in Florida, New York, and New Mexico.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure accused of sexually abusing the victim. The document details his pattern of abuse during travel, his private jet, and his properties.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Described as Epstein's partner who facilitated travel, normalized sexual abuse, was present during abuse, and instructed the victim.

persons.name: Sophie
persons.context: Mentioned as someone the victim recalls being on a flight with Epstein. The victim indicates she knew her.

persons.name: Jeff Schantz
persons.context: Mentioned as a name the victim was asked about regarding flight records; she answered "no" to knowing him.

persons.name: Eva
persons.context: Described as Epstein's ex-girlfriend who remained friends. The victim met her a few times but is unsure if she was involved in the massages.

persons.name: Michelle
persons.context: A friend of the victim who introduced her to drinks, hung out, and was involved in sexual conduct with Epstein. May have worked for Epstein's company.

persons.name: Harvey Weinstein
persons.context: Met by the victim at a Golden Globes party with Epstein. Epstein told Weinstein "hands off my girl."

persons.name: Henry Gereky
persons.context: A name the victim was asked about; she responded it "sounds familiar."

persons.name: Maria Minsky
persons.context: A name the victim was asked about; she responded "no."

connections.description: Described as "partners in crime." Maxwell facilitated Epstein's abuse, was present during acts, arranged travel, and normalized the behavior.
Described as ex-girlfriend who stayed friends. The victim met her a few times.
Michelle may have worked for Epstein's company and was involved in sexual conduct with him.
Michelle is described as a friend who hung out with the victim group; context implies association with Maxwell.
Met at a Golden Globes party. Epstein introduced the victim to Weinstein with a possessive comment.

events.title: First Trip to New Mexico
events.description: The victim's first trip to Epstein's New Mexico property. She recalls horses, hiking, and mostly sitting around. She is unsure of specific abuse there but notes her memories are foggy.

events.title: Flight from Florida to New York
events.description: A specific flight in May 1998 that the victim was asked about. She confirms Michelle was likely on this flight.

events.title: Final Trip with Epstein
events.description: The victim describes a trip from Los Angeles to New Mexico to Florida as likely the last time she saw Epstein. She felt she was being "shown off."

events.title: Escalation to Oral Sex and Rape
events.description: The victim states oral sex with Epstein took about a year to happen, occurring while still in Florida. She describes a rape incident in New York, with such assaults continuing while she lived at 45 Wall Street.

events.title: Group Massage Incident in California
events.description: Recalls a group massage at Shutters on the Beach in California where one girl got upset and cried because she had a boyfriend.

events.title: Meeting at Golden Globes Party
events.description: The victim met Harvey Weinstein at a Golden Globes party while with Epstein. Epstein told Weinstein "hands off my girl."

keyFacts: The victim's abuse by Jeffrey Epstein began when she was 14 years old, shortly after meeting him, and included sexual acts that escalated over time.
Ghislaine Maxwell played a central role in facilitating the abuse: arranging travel, being present during acts, instructing the victim, and normalizing the behavior.
Abuse occurred in multiple locations including Florida, New York, and New Mexico, often connected to travel on Epstein's private jet.
The victim describes a specific pattern where sexual abuse "always occurred on the other end" of travel with Epstein and Maxwell, with very few exceptions.
The victim denies any sexual abuse allegation involving Donald Trump, referencing a circulated picture with a different name attached.
